Title: Grml developers: Evgeni Golov: Unauthenticated RCE in Grandstream HT802V2 and probably others using gs_test_server DHCP vendor option
Description:
The Grandstream HT802V2 uses busybox' udhcpc for DHCP.
When a DHCP event occurs, udhcpc calls a script (/usr/share/udhcpc/default.script by default) to further process the received data.
On the HT802V2 this is used to (among others) parse the data in DHCP opt…
